dcterms:creator: Emmanuel Vincent
Shinji Watanabe
Aditya Arie Nugraha
Jon Barker
Ricard Marxer
dcterms:description: The CHiME-4 corpus is used for evaluating the proposed deep adversarial training method, consisting of real data recorded in noisy environments and simulated data generated by mixing clean speech data from the WSJ0 set with noisy backgrounds.
dcterms:title: CHiME-4

dcterms:description: The WSJ0 dataset is mentioned as the clean speech data used for GANs training, consisting of utterances that are utilized to generate clean feature representations from noisy features.
dcterms:title: WSJ0
